attributes.action: Ban the online sale of all knives
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime is a serious problem.  Banning only certain types of knives is highly problematic and still leaves scope for purchase of knives that can be used to cause harm.  If people want a knife, then they should go to a retailer who can verify age and intent of the purchase
attributes.background: To pass legislation that prevents the advertising and sale of all knives

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban selling knives online
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710870
